Uses of Package
org.opends.server.backends

  • Packages that use org.opends.server.backends 
    Package Description
    org.opends.server.api
    Contains a number of API declarations for use throughout the Directory Server.
    org.opends.server.backends
    Contains various Directory Server backend implementations.
    org.opends.server.backends.pluggable
    Contains the code for implementing Directory Server pluggable storage backends.
    org.opends.server.core
    Contains various classes that comprise the core of the Directory Server codebase.
    org.opends.server.tools
    Contains various Directory Server tool implementations.
  • Classes in org.opends.server.backends used by org.opends.server.api 
    Class Description
    RebuildConfig
    Configuration for the indexType rebuild process.
    VerifyConfig
    This class represents the configuration of a JE backend verification process.
  • Classes in org.opends.server.backends used by org.opends.server.backends 
    Class Description
    ChangelogBackend
    A backend that provides access to the changelog, i.e. the "cn=changelog" suffix.
    ConfigurationBackend.ConfigurationBackendCfg
    Dummy BackendCfg implementation for the ConfigurationBackend.
    RebuildConfig
    Configuration for the indexType rebuild process.
    RebuildConfig.RebuildMode
    Identifies how indexes will be selected for rebuild.
  • Classes in org.opends.server.backends used by org.opends.server.backends.pluggable 
    Class Description
    RebuildConfig
    Configuration for the indexType rebuild process.
    VerifyConfig
    This class represents the configuration of a JE backend verification process.
  • Classes in org.opends.server.backends used by org.opends.server.core 
    Class Description
    RootDSEBackend
    This class defines a backend to hold the Directory Server root DSE.
  • Classes in org.opends.server.backends used by org.opends.server.tools 
    Class Description
    RebuildConfig
    Configuration for the indexType rebuild process.
